meanings.definition: A plant of the parsley family, native to India and used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: The ajowan plant adds a unique flavor to Indian dishes.
meanings.sent2: I planted some ajowan in my garden to use in my cooking.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ajowan plant go to the cooking class? To spice things up!
meanings.sent4: The ajowan plant is like a flavorful artist painting the canvas of Indian cuisine.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of ajowan in the kitchen is like a warm hug from grandma.

meanings.definition: The small oval seeds of the ajowan plant, used as a spice in Indian cuisine.
meanings.sent1: I love the aroma of ajowan seeds in my curry.
meanings.sent2: Ajowan seeds are a staple in traditional Indian recipes.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ajowan seed refuse to jump into the curry? It was too hot to handle!
meanings.sent4: The ajowan seeds sprinkled on the dish were like tiny bursts of flavor fireworks.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of ajowan seeds in my meal is a delightful surprise.
